entries.title: The Abyss
entries.description: A dark, infinite void that corrupts everything it touches.

entries.title: Artorias the Abysswalker
entries.description: A knight who dared face the Abyss and lost.

entries.title: The Pale King
entries.description: The ruler of Hallownest, seeking to contain the Infection.

entries.title: The White Palace
entries.description: A shimmering palace of divine architecture, lost to memory.
